attributes.action: I want 109,000.00 children to have a home.
attributes.additional_details: These children did not do nothing wrong. It is us our society and our government that made these children homeless; it is us our society and UK Government that turned these children into drug addicts, it is us our society and UK Government that has failed to educate these children; It is us our Society and Government that failed to protect then from unwanted pregnancies, violence and abuse…………..  and it is  us and the UK Government that needs to fix this, it is us and our UK Government that needs to Invest in our children and if you do you will invest in our economy, our future, their future.
attributes.background: There are currently 109,000.00 homeless children in the UK (SHELTER December 2015). I want them to have homes, I want them to have a Christmas; I want them to have families and more than anything I want them to have a future.

rejection.details: If you would like the UK Government to take a specific action to tackle homelessness, you could start a petition asking for that.
